verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana ndiye
anayeitegemeza nafsi yangu,
anayeitegemeza
anayeitegemeza
anayeitegemeza
nafsi yangu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu kwa jina
lako uniokoe,
na kwa uweza wako
unifanyie hukumu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu uyasikie
maombi yangu,
uyasikilize maneno
ya kinywa changu kinywa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Maana wageni
wamenishambulia,
wote watishao wanaitafuta
nafsi yangu.
